divs: Sighting DetailsI have witnesed several sightings from my deck at my home i have reported them here! I have alsso been contacted be Tennessee Mufon and a lady in Jonesborough reported the same thing i seen a couple of months ago. I caugh this one tonight it was flying low near some kind of jet moved north west toward Kinsport TN and hoverd while I was recording it and then moved slowly out of sight. I first spotted this using my Binoculars watching the plane. I ran into the house and got my camcorder.
Summary: Circle flying near airplane in Kingsport Tennessee
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Jonesborough
